title: Tiger Research X Animoca Brands: Boosts Web3 in Korea - CryptoNewsZ
content:
Tiger Research and Animoca Brands have formed an exclusive collaboration for furthering business and marketing initiatives in South Korea. For the uninitiated, Tiger Research is engaged in research and Go-To-Market (GTM) consultation, having expertise in the Web3 space in Asia. On the other hand, Animoca Brands is into furthering digital property rights related to gaming and the open metaverse.

The collaboration will witness the furthering of Animoca Brand’s promotional and marketing ideas within the South Korean Web3 community. With the contribution of the expansive network and abundant know-how from Tiger Research, both entities have great expectations regarding increasing their presence in this growing arena. There are plans afoot to co-author research documents, as well as articles on matters related to Web3 gaming and decentralized education, bringing about fresh perceptions pertaining to blockchains, digital assets, and Web3 gaming.

According to the CEO of Tiger Research, Daniel Kim, this exclusive association, having been formed with Animoca Brands, will help propel their involvement with Web3 technologies. They further expect to observe the South Korean Web3 space coming to the forefront globally.

So far as the Co-Founder and Executive Chairman of Animoca Brands, Yat Siu, is concerned, with the participation of Tiger Research, they will have the opportunity to focus on areas of digital entertainment, as well as education, with further intensity. As a result, their position in South Korea will only become stronger.

Where Tiger Research is concerned, it is a research-based and GTM consultancy company within the Web3 space in Asia. Its goal is to provide individuals and businesses with an expanding digital economy. Tiger Research is known to introduce high-grade research and business consulting services to prime enterprises globally.

Animoca Brands, on the other hand, leads in verticals related to gamification, digital entertainment, and blockchain. The company is engaged in the furthering of property rights and plays a significant role in setting up the open metaverse. Animoca Brands is into the development and publishing of products and unique games like The Sandbox, Phantom Games, and a whole lot of others.

title: Elon Musk Has “Secretly” Been Funding Dogecoin Development, Report Reveals - ZyCrypto
content:
Advertisement

Reports have emerged that the world’s richest man, Elon Musk, could be secretly funding the development of Dogecoin (DOGE).

On August 31, The Wall Street Journal reported that Elon Musk has been secretly funding Dogecoin’s development. This revelation adds an intriguing layer to his prominent relationship with the canine-themed cryptocurrency.

DOGE, which started as a playful internet meme in 2013, garnered significant attention when Elon Musk publicly endorsed it in 2021 by revealing that Tesla would accept Dogecoin for some of its merchandise. In August of the same year, it was reported by various outlets that Musk would serve as an advisor to the Dogecoin Foundation, further cementing his connection to the project. However, in October 2021, Musk distanced himself, stating, “I have no connection with the Dogecoin Foundation.”

Nevertheless, despite these conflicting statements, Musk’s ties to DOGE persist. Musk acquired Twitter in April 2023 and altered its logo from the iconic blue bird to a Shiba Inu, symbolizing Dogecoin. This move hinted at Musk’s intentions to integrate DOGE into his Twitter-based plans.

These revelations come when the crypto market is experiencing heightened volatility. The recent slowdown in the Bitcoin price rally has affected not only Bitcoin but also Dogecoin, which is currently down about 90% from its May 2021 all-time high of $0.73. The crypto community is now bracing itself for a potentially turbulent September, with many wondering about the implications of Musk’s covert funding on the crypto landscape.

Advertisement

That said, while the extent of Musk’s financial involvement in Dogecoin’s development remains undisclosed, his ambitious plans for the cryptocurrency are clear. Musk has previously expressed his desire to elevate Dogecoin to outshine Bitcoin, aiming for it to become the “currency of Earth.”

Dogecoin, which achieved a brief stint in the crypto top ten in 2021 amid meme and influencer-driven rallies, saw its value fluctuate alongside the broader crypto market in 2022. Despite the volatility, it has retained a significant portion of its gains, resulting in a combined Dogecoin network worth approximately $8.9 billion, according to CoinMarketCap data.

Meanwhile, Elon Musk’s involvement in Dogecoin hints at potential developments that could reshape the future of its price and its applications. Most importantly, an official confirmation of the funding by the dogefather himself could catapult the DOGE price after a prolonged period of sapped volatility.

At press time, DOGE was trading at $0.0626 after a 1.66% drop in the past seven days.

title: MDT announces partnership with DWF Labs - CryptoNewsZ
content:
MDT, short for Measurable Data Token, has announced its strategic partnership with DWF Labs. The announcement comes based on the mutual mission of powering the future through a perfect blend of data and Artificial Intelligence. Together, they will help drive the adoption of decentralized data value for AI.

DWF Labs is now tasked with injecting liquidity into the ecosystem of MDT, along with some financial support. MDT gains largely from this as it enables the team to look into the expansion across the globe – in parts, if not entirely together. MDT has been eyeing such a footprint with an accelerated growth trajectory.

Moreover, MDT is likely to roll out a couple of new products and services.

Heatherm Huang, the Co-Founder of MDT, has expressed confidence in the partnership by saying that they are now a step closer with the assistance from DWF Labs. This refers to achieving the mission of a value-creation economy that is powered by blockchain technology.

Huang has shed some light on their own achievements as well. The Co-Founder has said that they have been able to successfully distribute data-sharing rewards to approximately 650k users of the ecosystem. Their purchase value amounted to over $130 million through 2 million+ anonymous transactional e-receipts data points.

Andrei Grachev, the Managing Partner of DWF Labs, has highlighted the importance of data in DeFi, which is decentralized finance. Andrei has said that such a type of data fuels the industry while also providing valuable insights to help train Artificial Intelligence better. Once trained, the technology is able to refine, enrich, and enhance the usability of data.

This drives perpetual innovation, said Andrei while calling the relationship between AI and data symbiotic.

MDT is an ecosystem for value creation wherein users are rewarded for sharing anonymous data points. MDT enables a secure exchange of data while ensuring anonymity on the blockchain.

DWF Labs is an investment firm and a digital asset market maker. It has a history of supporting companies in a wide variety of activities ranging from getting their tokens listed to market-making.

Interestingly, this is an update that has come after a long time from MDT. The last update was about rewarding the community members with their favorite Gift Card with 500 $MDT as a giveaway reward. It was accessible to the top 10 winners on the list between June 01, 2022, and June 07, 2022. The event was titled Reward Me This!, and it earned MDT a great deal of engagement with the community.

Despite having a longer gap between announcements, MFT has made sure that it comes up with updates that ultimately benefit the community. The one with DWF Labs aligns with this thought as it empowers the data value creation ecosystem for Artificial Intelligence.

Moving forward, DWF Labs and MDT will look to stand true to their agreed terms for the strategic partnership. Thereby ensuring liquidity and a positive growth trajectory.

title: Beyond transactions The multifaceted impact of Binance coin (BNB) - CryptoNewsZ
content:
Binance Coin (BNB) is a cryptocurrency developed and adopted by Binance, the largest cryptocurrency exchange in the world. It was intended to be used within the platform to facilitate transactions. Every quarter, BNB holders get up to 50% of Binance’s trade fees as payouts in the form of coins. This encourages more individuals to use and hold their coins over time, resulting in a unique market liquidity effect and organic price action.

In addition to the current regular banking and finance options, BNB provided supplementary services like savings or staking that encourage more cryptocurrency investments. Because of its reputation for dependability and stability, BNB has emerged as one of the most well-known names in the Bitcoin industry. This essay will describe the operation of this cutting-edge currency and the reasons investors worldwide continue to like it, from its benefits in transactions to its many applications based on individual preferences and needs.

A Gateway to the Binance Ecosystem

The BNB coin serves as a native token on the Binance exchange. It enables customers to trade on the platform with lower fees and gives them access to additional services such as margin trading, OTC trading, and staking other cryptocurrencies. In addition, it gives users access to several valuable features, such as the ability to use their partners’ currencies to pay for goods and services in various countries and to receive discounts at specific retailers. Additionally, the token is used to participate in Binance-sponsored Initial Exchange Offerings (IEOs). BNB coins are popular among crypto-ecosystem users because of their benefits and ease of use.

Due largely to the Binance ecosystem, consumers can utilize exchange services at reduced costs. A tiered system of discounts allows users of Binance, for example, to save up to 25% by paying fees in their native currency, BNB. Sub-accounts allow users to manage multiple accounts and portfolios simultaneously. Clients can also monitor the distribution of their funds across accounts within a single interface.

Diversifying Investment Portfolios

Since BNB’s 2017 debut, its value has increased significantly. Early on, it was solely a Bitcoin replacement with a few applications. As blockchain technology grew in popularity, BNB expanded its use cases beyond payment and transmission networks. Its underlying network provides a platform for decentralized applications (dApps) and a financial infrastructure. The price of this functional extension increased due to the increased demand it generated. As of 4th September, the estimated Market cap of BNB is $33,015,141,751, which is said to increase in the coming times, which shows how strong the coin is and a great choice for investment.

Adding additional services, such as staking and delegation, increased investors’ acceptability of passive income investments. As a result of BNB’s astounding 80x increase in value since its debut, investors worldwide are becoming increasingly interested in its growth potential.

The native coin of Binance, BNB, has achieved great success among investors and traders. As a popular alternative investment to cryptocurrencies, it has quickly surged to the top of the market. The coin was created to fund Binance’s DEX platform but now has many broader uses. It can be used in decentralized applications (Dapps) created on platforms such as Ethereum or Tron and on exchanges such as Binance and Huobi Exchange.

Powering Decentralized Applications (dApps)

The Binance Smart Chain (BSC) is a blockchain that integrates access to the entire BNB ecosystem with the swiftness of Ethereum-style smart contract transactions. All current BNB features, including wallets, exchanges, remittances, and more, are now accessible to developers. Decentralized applications (dApps) have many use cases due to BSC and BNB interactions.

Developers can create in-game markets utilizing non-fungible tokens, distributed finance protocols that reward players for lending money, tradable digital assets on their exchange platforms, and stock price or sporting event futures markets. All of these dApps are installed without further technology.

By enabling users to convert and transfer assets between blockchains, BNB facilitates cross-chain trading and is a vital link between diverse digital assets. Similarly, it facilitates efficient transaction processing, particularly for dApps; even in the BNB gambling sector, you aren’t reliant on payment providers, and the gambling platform won’t hold onto your winnings. When you win, you receive your money promptly with dApps, eliminating the need for extended payment processing waits.

Uniswap and Augur are examples of distributed applications (dApps) that use BNB as the medium of exchange due to its fast transaction speeds and low transaction fees. Holders utilize BNB tokens for various purposes, including staking incentives and as a medium of exchange within these dApp ecosystems. As a consequence, BNB gambling is now easier and safer in general.

Enabling NFT Marketplace Transactions

The Binance NFT Marketplace accepts BNB as payment for purchasing and selling digital collectibles. You make purchases with your remaining BNB tokens when the time is right. If the payment is successful, BNB tokens will be sent to the wallet address specified by the seller before the sale. On this website, customers can purchase using their Tron Wallets, BitGo, Coinbase, or standard credit/debit cards.

Using this technology eliminates all potential payment processing concerns associated with conventional currency transfers, ensuring the safety of all transactions. The fact that all transactions are publicly verifiable by both parties reduces the likelihood of fraud and makes it easier to track where your money is going.

Community Engagement and Voting

Using new currencies assures the security of all transactions by eliminating any potential payment processing issues that may arise with traditional currency transfers. Because all transactions are publicly verifiable on both sides, keeping track of where your money is going is easy. This reduces the likelihood of fraud even further.

To develop fair decision-making processes that benefit all parties, exchanging and considering diverse perspectives on new product launches or company regulations is possible. This ensures that all views are considered when decisions are made about various industries, fostering a culture in which everyone feels empowered to contribute regardless of their level of participation or expertise with crypto assets.

Challenges and Future Outlook

Binance Coin (BNB), a more complicated resource, may be difficult to employ. As this new asset class does not readily fit within the framework, regulation will be one of the most important issues to resolve. Trends in the market may reduce the value of BNB or make widespread adoption more difficult.

Government control, though, might get harder to work out as it gains popularity. This must be thoroughly researched before investing in BNB or any other crypto. The explosive growth and innovation of the industry could have unanticipated consequences, such as increasing the stakes for customer loyalty or altering how these assets are traded on exchanges, both of which legalize monitoring.

Conclusion

The study describes the popular cryptocurrency BNB and its numerous applications and outcomes. It facilitates trading and financial activity on exchanges such as Huobi and OKEx. Similarly, it has been integrated into China’s economic system, providing clients with access to blockchain technology, which is utilized in various industries, such as supply chain, logistics, and financial services.

Beyond that, BNB has contributed significantly to the growth of crypto knowledge through marketing and education programs. The well-known platform Binance Chain, which provides a wide range of decentralized apps (DApps), uses it as its native token, which is a final but not least support. These actions prove how this virtual currency may develop from a transactional tool to a potent market leader.
